modShortDescription: Remember the red HP bar that was shown off in A17? This mod adds that back into the game for folks who liked that idea.
modDescription:
Remember the red HP bar that was shown off in A17? This mod adds that back into the game for folks who liked that idea.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsXML/tree/main/KHA20-HPBars)** for A20  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-HPBars)** for A19

If you appreciate KhaineGBâ€™s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/khainegb).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25751-khaines-a20-modlets-bigger-backpacks-lockable-slots-behemoths-random-wandering-hordes-etc/).
